reporter_caption.center: STATE EX REL. PETERS v. RAYBORN, 521 So.2d 1149 (La. 1988)

caption.center: STATE EX REL. DENNIS PETERS v. FRANK C. RAYBORN, ET AL.

opinion.posture: In re Peters, Dennis; applying for supervisory and/or remedial writs; Parish of Washington, 22nd Judicial District Court, Div. "D", No. 36892.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Denied. All documents and statements required by R.S.15:566(C) and C.Cr.P. 892 were submitted properly when relator was delivered to Hunt Correctional Center.
